src:
紐約州健保市場諮詢會 11/16布碌崙登場

07 Nov 2019, 21:55

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月08日訊】紐約州官方健保市場註冊開始啦！紐約州健保、新唐人電視台和大紀元媒體集團將為華人社區舉辦四場「紐約州健保市場註冊諮詢會」，紐約州健保市場的官員現場免費講解，幫助您找到最適合您和您家人的合適健保計劃。保險業專業人士、醫生以及其它商家也在現場免費提供諮詢和義診。
紐約州健保市場提供的所有計劃都涵蓋了醫生拜訪，住院，緊急醫療，產婦和新生兒護理，精神健康和藥物濫用障礙服務，處方藥，康復服務和設備， 實驗室服務，預防和保健服務，慢性病管理以及小兒牙科和視力保健。
這些計劃包括醫療補助（Medicaid）、兒童健保計劃（Child Health Plus）、基本計劃和合格健康計劃。
經過認證的保險註冊助理可以指導您完成註冊過程，並確定您是否有資格獲得財務資助，以幫助您支付健保計劃費用。歡迎參加健保註冊諮詢會。
布碌崙首場活動日內容有：

紐約州健保市場項目協調員陳敏敏主講：「2020紐約州健保市場開放註冊和福利」；
安保健保市場營業經理吳偉傑主講：「基本計劃知多少」（Emblem Health Plan）；
醫學博士張維健醫生主講：「防止乙肝變肝癌」；
紐約聽力科專家、東方聽力中心郭志勇先生主講：「老年人聽力健康與保健」。

活動現場還有多個免費健保諮詢、義診和其它活動，包括：

各類保險諮詢和註冊服務
東方聽力中心提供聽力檢查與義診
麥迪臣社區中心心理健康咨詢
寶寶大藥房提供量血壓、藥物諮詢
免費品嚐獲得韓國總統獎的 「口喜CookSee韓式米線 」
小孩當場學習手工藝術製作，等等

家長也可以帶著孩子前往，活動中穿插舞蹈表演和給小孩的禮物。也感謝附近商家的大力支持，給活動提供了好多禮品，包括價值390美元的大象牌電飯煲、價值188美元九陽豆漿機、價值180美元前列腺保健品（漢方）、價值168美元玄寶黑蔘口服液、多個價值45美元普瑞堂植物魚油、多張價值50美元的購物卡。

以下是首場活動信息：

時間：11月16日（週六）
早上11點至下午3點
地點：布碌崙救世軍華人堂社區中心（The Salvation Army Community Center）
7307 18th Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11204

您可以乘坐


地鐵D車至18大道（84街）站下走10個街口或轉乘B8至Bay Ridge Pkwy
地鐵N車至18大道（64街）站下走9個街口或轉乘B8至72街
公交車B8至18大道/72街下

另有三場將在法拉盛舉行。

第二場

時間：11月30日（週六）
早上11點至下午3點
地點：法拉盛市政廳（Flushing Town Hall）
137-35 Northern Blvd, Flushing, NY 11354

第三場

時間：12月07日（週六）
下午1點至下午5點
地點：法拉盛台灣會館（Taiwan Center）
13744 Northern Blvd, Flushing, NY 11354

第四場

時間：01月11日（週六）
早上11點至下午3點
地點：法拉盛啓揚社區中心 （Glow Community Center）
133-29 41st Ave, Flushing, NY 11354
(責任編輯：張超)

text:
New York State Health Insurance Market Advisory Council 11/16 Brooklyn debut

07 Nov 2019, 21:55

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 08, 2019] New York State official health insurance market registration began! New York State Health Insurance, NTDTV and Epoch Times Media Group will host four “New York State Health Care Market Registration Advisory Meetings” for Chinese communities. Officials from the New York State Health Insurance Market will provide free on-site explanations to help you find the right health insurance for you and your family. plan. Insurance professionals, doctors and other businesses also provide free consultation and free clinics on site.
All programs offered by the New York State Health Insurance Market cover doctor visits, hospitalization, emergency medical care, maternal and newborn care, mental health and substance abuse disorder services, prescription drugs, rehabilitation services and equipment, laboratory services, prevention and care services, chronic diseases Management and pediatric dentistry and vision care.
These programs include Medicaid, Child Health Plus, Basic Plan, and Qualified Health Plan.
A certified Insurance Registration Assistant can guide you through the registration process and determine if you are eligible for financial assistance to help you pay for your health plan. Welcome to the Health Care Registration Advisory Council.
The first event day of Brooklyn has:

Chen Minmin, Coordinator of the New York State Health Insurance Market Project, delivered a lecture: "The New York State Health Insurance Market Open Registration and Benefits";
Wu Weijie, Business Manager of An Health Insurance Market, delivered a lecture: "Embedm Know Plan" (Emblem Health Plan);
Dr. Zhang Weijian, MD, speaks: "Preventing hepatitis B from becoming liver cancer";
Mr. Guo Zhiyong, an expert in hearing at New York and the Oriental Listening Center, gave a lecture on "Hearing Health and Health for the Elderly".

There are also several free health care consultations, free clinics and other activities at the event site, including:

Various insurance consulting and registration services
Oriental Hearing Center provides hearing and clinic
Madison Community Center Mental Health Consultation
Baby pharmacy provides blood pressure, drug consultation
Free to taste the Korean President's Award for "Korean CookSee Korean Rice Noodle"
Children learn handmade art on the spot, etc.

Parents can also take their children to the event, where dance performances and gifts for children are interspersed. Thanks also for the strong support from nearby businesses, and provided a lot of gifts for the event, including the elephant rice cooker worth 390 US dollars, the 9 188 soybean milk machine, the value of 180 US dollars prostate health products (Chinese side), the value of 168 dollars Xuan Bao black 蔘Oral solution, multiple $45 Puritang plant fish oil, multiple shopping cards worth $50.

The following is the first event information:

Time: November 16 (Saturday)
11 am to 3 pm
Venue: The Salvation Army Community Center, Brooklyn
7307 18th Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11204

You can ride


Take the subway D to the 18th Avenue (84th Street) stop for 10 blocks or transfer to B8 to Bay Ridge Pkwy
Take the subway N to the 18th Avenue (64th Street) station and walk down 9 blocks or transfer to B8 to 72 Street.
Bus B8 to 18 Avenue / 72 Street

Three other events will be held in Flushing.

second round

Time: November 30th (Saturday)
11 am to 3 pm
Location: Flushing Town Hall
137-35 Northern Blvd, Flushing, NY 11354

Third game

Time: December 07 (Saturday)
1 pm to 5 pm
Venue: Taiwan Center (Taiwan Center)
13744 Northern Blvd, Flushing, NY 11354

Fourth game

Time: January 11 (Saturday)
11 am to 3 pm
Location: Flushing Community Center (Glow Community Center)
133-29 41st Ave, Flushing, NY 11354
(Editor: Zhang Chao)
